name: Harai
description:
Harai: Purification of Souls is an action role-playing game set in a medieval world where adventurers and demons will clash, leaving civilians in the crossfire. As a brave hero, you must journey through hordes of demonic foes and ultimately face the ultimate evil to restore peace and harmony to the world. Experience intense combat with an array of weapons, investigate gorgeous and hazardous realms, and uncover the secrets of the demons' emergence. Battle your way through dungeons and conquer the forces of darkness to reclaim the world and save the innocent people in peril.

Created for Integrative Programming and Technology 1 

  • Epic Questing - Embark on a thrilling adventure to save the world from a certain mysterious demon and uncover powerful rewards.
  • Dynamic Combat - Engage in intense battles against a variety of enemies, using your own unique strategies.
  • Weapon Switch - Equip yourself with new weapons to take on the enemies and customize your combat style
  • Interactive World - Explore a stunningly detailed world and uncover its secrets.

Created, developed and presented by Manna Workshop
